title: Bug 102623: Image cannot be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not getting refreshed. The original image is still displayed instead of the new one.
OB: When importing new 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the original image is still displayed.
EB: After importing new 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the new image should be displayed.
SR: Steps to reproduce:1. Import new 'image1.jpg' into the layout.2. Verify that the original image is still displayed instead of the new one.
